src:
Troti ne popuščajo
01 Nov 2019, 10:50 by B. B.
Novo mesto - V četrtem krogu 2. slovenske košarkarske lige so novomeški Troti v domači dvorani Livada v sredo vknjižili še četrto zmago v sezoni. S 74:61 (24:16, 10:7, 21:20, 19:18) so bili boljši od Ljubljane, ki ostaja še brez zmage.
Tekma se je začela z 20-minutno zakasnitvijo, saj so imeli goste težave na poti v dolenjsko prestolnico, kar pa Novomeščanov ni preveč zmedlo, saj so hitro prevzeli pobudo in povedli z dvomestno prednostjo. V drugi četrtini so ritem še stopnjevali, do najvišje prednosti 21 točk pa prišli na začetku tretjega dela tekme. Gostje so v zadnjih desetih minutah lovili priključek, se približali na osem točk zaostanka, bližje pa jim Troti niso dovolili. Rumeni so tekmo mirno pripeljali do konca in zasluženo vpisali novi dve točki.
Za Trote tokrat ni zaigral najboljši strelec Črt Ristić, v postavo pa je bil prvič uvrščen domači up Timon Krašovec, ki pa tokrat še ni stopil na parket. Prvi strelec domačega moštva je bil Jure Prus z 12 točkami, prvi dvojni dvojček v dresu Trotov pa je uspel Roku Saviću, ki je dosegel 11 točk in zbral ravno toliko skokov. Rok Vidrih je ujel devet odbitih žog, medtem ko je kapetan Bojan Krivec v zgolj 12 minutah na svoj račun vpisal osem asistenc.
Trote že jutri čaka nova preizkušnja, saj bodo prvič gostovali v hramu slovenske košarke, Hali Tivoli, kjer jih pričakuje moštvo Ilirije. Obračun med Dolenjci in ekipo, ki je minuli dve sezoni nastopali med slovensko košarkarsko elito, bo na sporedu ob 19. uri.
text:
Drones do not yield
01 Nov 2019, 10:50 by B.B.
Novo mesto - In the fourth round of the 2nd Slovenian Basketball League, the Trotto of Novo mesto in the home court of Livada on Wednesday posted a fourth victory of the season. With 74:61 (24:16, 10: 7, 21:20, 19:18) they were better than Ljubljana, which still has no victory.
The match started with a 20-minute delay, as the guests had problems on their way to the capital of Dolenjska, which did not confuse the Novomestans, as they quickly took the initiative and led with a double-digit advantage. In the second quarter, the pace increased, with the highest score of 21 points coming at the beginning of the third part of the game. In the last ten minutes, the guests were fishing for the dock, approaching eight points behind, and closer to Trot, they were not allowed. The Yellows calmly brought the game to a close and deservedly entered a new two points.
The top scorer Črt Ristic did not play for Trot this time, but first time home runner Timon Krašovec was included in the lineup, but this time he has not stepped on the floor. The home team's first goal scorer was Jure Prus with 12 points, and the first double in the Trot's jersey was managed by Roko Savić, who scored 11 points and collected just as many rebounds. Deadline Vidrich caught nine rebounds while captain Bojan Krivec tallied eight assists in just 12 minutes.
Trot is already facing a new ordeal tomorrow, for the first time they will be hosting the Slovenian Basketball Hall, Hali Tivoli, where the Illyrian team are expecting them. The showdown between Dolenjci and the team that played for the past two seasons among the Slovenian basketball elite will be scheduled at 7pm.
